EmailTemplate.name: 01-27-22 HOS eWeekly Newsletter.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Have you tried our new Support Forum?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: January 27, 2022 The New Hospitality Sales and Support forums are now live on Microsoft Teams. The Forums are a great way to seek and share information among your peers and other partners. CLICK HERE TO ENROLL <[[https://forms.office.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=9_FNrh5hT0SJfvlk4SBRcYsSy2hHry1MjB0xbzaiNd9UNlFPRFg2Uk41RE42S1ZPQ1U2UjFCU1EwTy4u]]> Pro Tip – Make Your Forum Message Stand Out and easily Searchable! Make you message header BOLD! How To: - Start a New Conversation - Enter the topic text - Select the “format” icon below the topic text - Select Bold, Underline, etc. - Send We look forward to your participation! <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
